title: William Shakespeare - 18 - Merchant of Venice - bbc 2000
description:
What if my house be troubled with a rat,
And I be pleased to give ten thousand ducats
To have it baned? What, are you answered yet?
Some men there are love not a gaping pig,
Some that are mad if they behold a cat,
And others when the bagpipe sings iÃ¢â‚¬â„¢thÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ nose
Cannot contain their urine; for affection,
Mistress of passion, sways it to the mood
Of what it likes or loathes. . . .
. . .
So can I give no reason, nor I will not,
More than a lodged hate and a certain loathing
I bear Antonio, that I follow thus
A losing suit against him. Are you answered?Ã‚Â  

The bbc radio collection Merchant of Venice - CDs from 2000 ( first broadcast by the bbc in 1997)

Warren Mitchell plays the title role of the creditor demanding his pound of flesh (irresistibly reminding one of contemporary events)
